Go back to the previous screen
Open recent apps

Take a screenshot

Show power menu (Restart, Shutdown, etc.)

Open Quick Settings

Zoom in/out on images, maps, etc.
Open Google Assistant (on most devices)

ios.keys: Swipe Up (from bottom in an app)

ios.description: Perform a custom action (like taking a screenshot)
Perform another custom action (like opening an app)

ios.keys: Hold Power Button + Home Button (Older iPhones)

word.description: Move cursor one character or line
Move cursor by word or paragraph

slack.description: Add a new line in message
